text: What should a software engineer (web) start by learning - Erlang, Haskell, Python, C++, F#
What would you suggest what will be the next choice of language that could benefit an engineer in his career utmost?
I am a Software Engineer and almost everything I engineered is for WWW.
I have decided to learn a language and keep it learning parallel.
I'm fluent in C# and JavaScript.
But, apart from it I want to learn a language which would have a future in the industry.
A discussion on Haskell vs F#
